import React, {useState} from "react"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import LogoSVG from '../assets/img/pizza-logo.svg' import Search from './Search' function Header() { const { items, totalPrice} = useSelector(selectCart) const totalCount = items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0) return (

React Pizza

самая вкусная пицца во вселенной

{totalPrice} $
{totalCount}
) } export default Header;
